tool_description: Filters and validates SNP data for quality control, removing low-quality markers and identifying potential genotyping errors.

exclude_sex_chromosomes.description: Exclude X and Y chromosome markers

error_messages: Invalid threshold values: min_call_rate must be 0.8-1.0, max_missing_rate must be 0.0-0.2.
Insufficient data: Not enough SNPs remain after quality filtering.
Hardy-Weinberg threshold error: Value must be between 0.0001 and 0.05.
No valid SNPs: All markers failed quality control filters.
usage: Set quality control thresholds based on your analysis requirements. Higher thresholds provide stricter filtering but may reduce data size.

snps_passed.description: Number of SNPs that passed quality control

snps_filtered.description: Number of SNPs removed by filtering
